PluginData.Author: rosudrag
PluginData.Tooltip: Instantly paint your ships with multiple styles - military camo, stealth, industrial & more!
PluginData.Description:
Transform your grids with professional paint jobs in seconds!
FEATURES: • Multiple paint styles: Classic, Military, Stealth, Asteroid Camo, Industrial, Deep Space • Smart coloring: Different colors for functional vs armor blocks • Navigation lights: Automatic port (red) & starboard (green) light coloring • Unique variations: Each ship gets its own color variation based on ID • Works with Build Colors mod for custom palettes
COMMANDS: /paint help - Show all commands /paint run - Apply default paint job /paint run military - Green-grey camouflage /paint run military stealth - Ultra-dark stealth coating /paint run military asteroid - Orange-brown asteroid camo /paint run military industrial - Yellow-grey with hazard stripes /paint run military deep_space - Dark blue-purple for space
Simply point at any grid and type the command to instantly transform its appearance!
